Delete task confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this task ?
Delete step confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this step ?
Delete set confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this set ?
Delete card confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this card ?
Delete multiple card confirmation conten: Are you sure you want to permanently delete %s cards ?
Delete account confirmation content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account ?
Study Streak congrats: Congratulation you have been studying for %s days in a row!
Info tap card: You can tap the card to see its other side.
Info swipe card: You can swipe left (Don't Know) or right (Know) and go the next card.
Info swipe left card: You are still learning the card.
Info written mode enter: If your answer hasn't been checked yet it will be checked, otherwise go to the next card.
Info written mode ctrl enter: Add a new line to your answer.
Info written mode: Your answer will be compared to the other side of the card. When comparing the case is ignored.
set finished perfect: 🌟 Your mastery is undeniable! Your dedication to learning is truly inspiring. Keep up the incredible work, and you'll continue to excel in your studies! 📚🚀
set finished congrats: 🌟 Wow! You're on fire! Your near-perfect score is proof of your dedication and hard work. Keep it up, and you'll conquer any challenge that comes your way! 🚀
set finished congrats 2: 🎉 Congratulations! Your outstanding result shows your dedication and hard work. Keep up the fantastic work ! 💪
set finished great: 👏 Great work! Your result shows your commitment to learning. Keep using CorrectInk, and you'll continue to improve and achieve even greater success! 📚💪
set finished great 2: 🚀 Keep up the hard work, and you'll continue to make great strides in your learning journey. Success is a series of small steps, and you're on the right path! 💪📚🌟
set finished OK: 👏 Good effort! You're making progress, and that's what matters most. Keep studying and practicing, and you'll see even better results in the future. You've got this! 📚👍
set finished learning: 💪 Don't be disheartened by your result! Every great journey has its bumps. Keep pushing forward, and you'll see progress in no time! 💡🌱💜
Email hint: Enter a valid email like abc@gmail.com
Login page hint: Please login or register a new account.
Sign up hint: Already have an account? Log in.
Error name empty: Please enter your firstname and lastname.
Error email invalid: The email your entered is invalid.
Set saved message:
The set has been saved!
You can now edit it to your will. However you can't change its visibility public.
Error add cards: You are not allowed to add cards to sets that don't belong to you.
Error navigate set: You can't go to this set. It has been deleted or is no longer public
Error update account: The account information could not be updated
Account updated: Your account information has been updated!
Name: Name
Set name hint: Enter the name of your set.
Error edit message: You are not allowed to edit %s that don't belong to you.
Error delete message: You are not allowed to delete %s that don't belong to you.
Error offline sets: You need to be online to see public sets
Placeholder no steps: No steps have been added to this task.
Lenient mode on: 1 typo or 1 added/missing letter is accepted
Lenient mode off: Your input must be identical to the correct answer (case ignored)
Lenient mode correct result: With lenient mode enabled your answer is correct
Info written lenient mode: When lenient mode is enabled 1 substitution or 1 added/missing letter is accepted.
Notification denied: You have not given CorrectInk the permission to push notifications!
Spaced repetition info: Spaced repetition is a learning strategy that optimizes retention by reviewing information at increasing intervals over time to reinforce long-term memory.
Study all cards info: Study all the cards all the time, not matter how well you know them and how often you see them.
Require all answers on: You need to get all the possible answers correctly.
Repeat until known on: The study session continues until all the cards have been correctly answered, repeating those that were answered incorrectly.
Repeat until known off: The study session concludes once all the cards have been reviewed once, the incorrectly answered cards are not revisited.
No cards to study: Currently, you have no cards to study due to the spaced repetition method.
No cards to study info: This method utilizes algorithms to optimize your learning by showing you only the cards that require review to reinforce long-term memory.
No cards to study how to disable: You can disable this option in the set's settings (top right corner).
Get all answers result missing: The option 'Require all possible answer is enabled'
Enter link Image: Enter the URL of an image
Image url invalid: This is not the URL of an image
Error set null: The set could not be fetched correctly, try again later !
Error set null tip: If you were looking at a public set it's possible the owner changed its visibility, or even deleted it.
No tasks uncompleted myDay: You don't have any tasks planned for today!
Delete account confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account ? This action is definitive.
Existing card found description: A card with the same front has been found in your set, see the comparison below.
Found card modified tip: * modification made to the existing card
Import cards description: Import new cards from a CSV file.
Export set description: Export all the cards of your set to a CSV file.
Set empty description: Add cards manually or import them from a csv file !
Card copied to set: The card has been added to '%s'
No card added to set: No card was added to the set.
